title: ImportError: libcurand.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
body_html:
I install pytorch from source.
when I run:
import torch
I encounter the issue such as:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/user/anaconda3/envs/python2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 84, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: libcurand.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

how to solve it? thanks!!!!

body:
I install pytorch from source. 
when I run:
`import torch`
I encounter the issue such as:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/user/anaconda3/envs/python2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 84, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: libcurand.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```
how to solve it? thanks!!!!
